text: Giorgio Pasetto (4 July 1941 – 12 May 2022) was an Italian politician. He was member of Christian Democracy, the Italian People's Party, and Democracy is Freedom – The Daisy. He was President of Lazio from 1992 to 1994, was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1996 to 2006, and a Senator from 2006 to 2008. He was born in Nettuno, Italy. Pasetto died in Rome, Italy on 12 May 2022 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Lazio
title: Giorgio Pasetto
